reqs:
Equivalents: OCCH 515
Course for students in the Masters of Occupational Hygiene program. Other students need the permission of the instructor to register. Course will be held in SPPH 325
Please contact Professor for location information.
courseName: Industrial and Environmental Acoustics and Vibration
description: Fundamentals of acoustics and vibrations, physiologic effects, measurement, instrumentation, interpretation of data, industrial standards, and control. For students in Occupational and Environmental Hygiene; other graduate students may enrol with permission of the instructor.
